title: Value of result after nested selection

content.question: result <math alttext="←" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>←</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> 1IF(score1 > 500){result <math alttext="←" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>←</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> result + 1IF(score2 > 500){result <math alttext="←" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>←</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> result + 1}ELSE{result <math alttext="←" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>←</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> result + 2}}ELSE{result <math alttext="←" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>←</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> result + 5IF(score2 > 500){result <math alttext="←" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>←</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> result + 1}ELSE{result <math alttext="←" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>←</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> result - 1}}If the value of score1 is 350 and the value of score2 is 210, what will be the value of result after the code segment is executed?

skill.text: Skill 4.B: Determine the result of code segments.
